UI.textUI

Class TextIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.textUI.TextIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TextIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Define the Text IO to print the a Screen. (i.e. all Screen's interaction should comes from here)
